verbs.description: Hospital bosses [V: have] hit back at Donald Trump after he likened a London hospital to a ' military war zone ' after a spate of stabbings in the capital .
[ARG0: Hospital bosses] have [V: hit] back [ARG2: at Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: after he likened a London hospital to a ' military war zone ' after a spate of stabbings in the capital] .
Hospital bosses have hit back at Donald Trump after [ARG0: he] [V: likened] [ARG1: a London hospital] [ARG2: to a ' military war zone '] [ARGM-TMP: after a spate of stabbings in the capital] .
